title: Limits liability for unemployment claims of certain claimants employed by municipalities
summary: Provides that where an unemployment claimant was employed by a municipality for less than 2 days during the year preceding the filing of a valid claim and continues to be so employed, the municipality's unemployment account shall not be charged for unemployment benefits paid to such claimant.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to experience rating charge for unemployment benefits
